title: Sarah Farnsworth Hatch
text:
Hello! I am a third-year PhD student at Harvard Graduate School of Education.
I study what we can do (programs, interventions) to help kids thrive, especially before they start to experience social, emotional, academic, or behavioral problems. I am trained by applied developmental psychologists with a focus on prevention and implementation science.
Check out my projects tab to see what Iâ€™m currently working on, or my CV for my most recent academic publications.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
